column5: Nice to see you on the shoot with Marc.  http://www.fishfactor.tv/trailer.html
Had the chance to finally meet Marc at Thomas Marine last month. What an impressive, and pleasant man. Knows his stuff, no doubt about it.

Wow Roy.  Thanks.  Joining Marc for the day was a blast.  We have plans to get out again in the Spring.  Maybe it's time to start posting a few reports on here, hope the ol crew ain't too hard on me!  RJ
That looks good. It's nice to see a show that is more like the way I fish.
